name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Full-Stack Engineer with extensive experience in **Java**, **TypeScript**, **Angular**, and **Spring**. Skilled in leveraging modern technologies including **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Jenkins**, **GitLab**, and **MySQL** to design scalable and reliable applications. Adept in creating user-centric interfaces using frameworks such as **AngularJS** and **ExtJS**. Proven track record of enhancing application performance and automating processes in sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance. Recognized for delivering innovative solutions through clean coding practices and robust architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** and **Spring Boot** to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and significantly enhancing adherence rates through automated reminders.
Developed RESTful APIs with **Spring Data JPA**, increasing data accuracy by **40%** and enabling secure EHR integration using **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Implemented frontend solutions using **TypeScript**, **Angular**, and **React** with **Ant Design**, enhancing UI/UX and reducing completion time by **30%**.
Built a robust notification system utilizing **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery.
Established and configured CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, reducing deployment times by **80%**.
Containerized microservices using **Docker**, facilitating seamless deployment processes across development, staging, and production environments.
Managed cloud services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, achieving a remarkable **99.9%** uptime and optimizing load handling through **Redis** caching.

• Developed scalable backend services using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **Node.js**, resulting in a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
• Engineered a notification system utilizing **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
• Designed and implemented a customer insights dashboard with **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, enhancing resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment processes using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a reliable and consistent release workflow.
• Deployed the entire platform on **AWS EC2** leveraging **Docker** and **Terraform**, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
• Integrated CI/CD practices in collaboration with **GitLab**, utilizing **Maven** for build automation and **JUnit** for unit testing.

- Developed robust backend REST APIs leveraging **Java (Spring Boot)**, **Hibernate**, and **PostgreSQL**, achieving **98% uptime**.
- Designed dynamic frontend applications using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, enhancing load times by **40%**.
- Conducted thorough testing initiatives utilizing **JUnit** and **Mockito**, which led to a **30% reduction** in bugs.
- Enhanced frontend performance via lazy loading and code splitting techniques, resulting in significantly faster load times.
- Deployed scalable solutions globally using **AWS** with **CloudFront** and **S3** for low-latency access, ensuring optimal performance and availability.
- Collaborated with CI/CD tools like **Jenkins** and containerization platforms such as **Docker** to streamline development processes.

skills:

	Java, TypeScript, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, ExtJS, AngularJS

	RESTful API design

	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, GitLab, Cucumber, Selenium, Playwright

	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack, Humio, Honeycomb
